title: ★ EAST BOSTON ★Renovated 2 Bdrm ★ Avail 9/1
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 250012592', 'Rent: $2,725 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: street parking', 'LANDLORD PAYS 50% BROKERS FEE!', 'Located a few blocks away from Blue line train station This 800sq ft. apartment has 2 bedroom and 1 bathroom.', 'It has an open concept living space.', 'Kitchen has white cabinets with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Features of the apartment includes, gleaming hardwood floors throughout, central A/C, rear roof deck and washer/dryer in the unit.', 'Less than 5 minutes walk to the blue line train station and Bremen Street Community Park.', 'Half month rent brokers fee.', 'Bus: 116 Meridian St @ Lexington St (0.38 mi)', 'Bus: 117 Meridian St @ Saratoga St (0.37 mi)', (0.21 mi)', 'Bus: 112 Chelsea St @ Eagle Sq (0.47 mi)', 'Utilities: Update Geo Location  ·  Fix Access  ·  Fix Photos  ·  Fix Photo Count', 'Joyce Fung', '267 218 5231', 'Benjamin Apartments, LLC', brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of
